name: The Forest Ranger, and the forest spirits
name_original: The Forest Ranger, and the forest spirits
description:
Forest Ranger

You play as a forest ranger. You have an incredibly low tolerance for anything remotely scary, and so on your way home from your shift, you are harassed by the jesters of the forest. Forest Spirits. 

Controls:

WASD to move.

Space to jump.

Shift to run.
